posts.title: CSS
posts.content: CSS is a language that can be used to add style to an HTML page.

posts.title: Django
posts.content: Django is a web framework written using Python that allows for the design of web applications that generate HTML dynamically.

posts.title: Git
posts.content: Git is a version control tool that can be used to keep track of versions of a software project.

posts.title: GitHub
posts.content: GitHub is an online service for hosting git repositories.

posts.title: Python
posts.content: Python is a programming language that can be used both for writing command-line scripts or building web applications.
